short.description: Return a terse answer. Verbose reply is the default

type.description: Valid BIND 9 query type. Defaults to 'A'

trace.description: Enable the 'trace' query option. Disabled by default

rules: when command is net-utils:dig when command is net:dig allow
dig.long_description:
Simple wrapper for the `dig` command line utility. Only a select
few options are exposed in this command; it is not intended to
be a complete "dig in chat" tool.

count.description: Number of times to ping.  Defaults to 5

rules: when command is net-utils:ping when command is net:ping allow
ping.long_description:
Simple wrapper for the `ping` command line utility. Only a select
few options are exposed in this command; it is not intended to
be a complete "ping in chat" tool.

server.description: The server to use as source for nslookup.

rules: when command is net-utils:nslookup when command is net:nslookup allow
nslookup.long_description: Simple wrapper for the `nslookup` command line utility.
